glassMorphism.container: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/20 p-8 rounded-3xl border-2 border-white/30 shadow-2xl shadow-white/20 hover:shadow-white/40 transition-all
glassMorphism.title: text-white/90 text-2xl font-medium bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-white/90 to-white/70

cyberpunk.container: bg-black p-8 border-l-4 border-r-4 border-cyan-400 rounded-none shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(34,211,238,0.6)] animate-pulse hover:border-pink-500 transition-all duration-300
cyberpunk.title: text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-cyan-400 to-pink-500 bg-clip-text text-2xl font-mono uppercase tracking-[0.2em] glitch

brutalist.container: bg-yellow-300 p-8 border-8 border-black transform -rotate-2 hover:rotate-0 transition-all duration-300 shadow-[16px_16px_0_0_rgba(0,0,0,1)]
brutalist.title: text-black text-3xl font-black uppercase transform translate-x-2 -translate-y-1

softUI.title: text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-700 to-gray-500 bg-clip-text text-2xl font-medium

nature.container: bg-gradient-to-b from-green-50 via-emerald-50 to-green-100 p-8 rounded-2xl border-2 border-green-200/50 shadow-inner shadow-green-100/50 hover:shadow-green-200/50 transition-all
nature.title: text-green-800 text-2xl font-serif italic

retro80s.container: bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 via-pink-500 to-red-500 p-8 border-4 border-yellow-300 shadow-[0_0_40px_rgba(234,179,8,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_60px_rgba(234,179,8,0.4)] transition-all
retro80s.title: text-2xl font-black tracking-[0.25em] text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-yellow-300 via-white to-yellow-300 bg-clip-text animate-gradient

techMinimal.container: bg-zinc-900 p-8 rounded-lg border border-zinc-700/50 shadow-2xl shadow-zinc-900/50 backdrop-blur-sm hover:border-zinc-600 transition-all
techMinimal.title: text-zinc-100 text-2xl font-extralight tracking-wider leading-relaxed

japaneseZen.container: bg-stone-50 p-12 rounded-none border-t-2 border-b-2 border-stone-300 shadow-inner transition-all hover:bg-stone-100
japaneseZen.title: text-stone-800 text-3xl font-extralight tracking-[0.3em] leading-loose

candy.container: bg-gradient-to-br from-pink-300 via-purple-300 to-indigo-400 p-8 rounded-3xl shadow-xl shadow-pink-200/50 hover:shadow-purple-300/50 transition-all animate-gradient-slow
candy.title: text-white text-2xl font-bold drop-shadow-lg

corporate.container: bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-700 to-blue-600 p-8 rounded-xl shadow-lg shadow-blue-500/30 hover:shadow-blue-500/40 transition-all
corporate.title: text-white text-2xl font-semibold tracking-wide

eco.container: bg-gradient-to-br from-emerald-50 to-green-50 p-8 rounded-2xl border-2 border-emerald-100/50 shadow-inner shadow-emerald-50 hover:shadow-emerald-100 transition-all
eco.title: text-emerald-800 text-2xl font-medium leading-relaxed

futureTech.container: bg-gradient-to-r from-slate-900 to-slate-800 p-8 rounded-xl border border-blue-500/40 shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(59,130,246,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_40px_rgba(59,130,246,0.4)] transition-all
futureTech.title: text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-400 to-cyan-400 bg-clip-text text-2xl font-medium tracking-wide
